aboutpara: I am a full stack developer with expertise in Reactjs, Nextjs, Material-UI, Node.js, Redux, Socket.io, Pusher, Chart.js, Threejs and API development. I can help you build a responsive and scalable web application that meets your needs. Whether you need a web application built from scratch, or you need someone to help you improve an existing web application, I am here to help!.

resume.tagline: I'm a Full stack software Developer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
